Home.startYourJourney: Start your journey in the US virtually today.
Home.newWayOfLearningEnglish: Immigo is the new way of learning English through immersion.
Home.pickASession: Pick a session that fits what you are looking for.
Home.ourClassesAreLive: Our sessions are live, around 5 to 15 people, 50 minutes long. Our sessions are designed to simulate real life situations that happen in English speaking countrieslike the United States and Canada.
Home.firstPartSession: First part of the session: Lesson
Home.first15Minutes: First 15 minutes, an experienced native speaker coach will give you a lesson, comprised of different expressions that you will practiceusing in the discussion.
Home.secondPartSession: Second part of the session: Immersion
Home.theRest35Minutes: The rest of 35 minutes are dedicated to you practicing what you just learned with 2 to 3 other people. These are different scenarios and discussion questions based on real life situations.
Home.afterTheSession: After the session, you will get a feedback report on what you can do differently in your next session!
